```diff
+             title={showBanner ? 'éšè—Banner' : 'æ˜¾ç¤ºBanner'}
+           >
+             <ImageIcon size={16} />
+           </button>
          </div>
  
```

```diff
          {/* Banner */}
          <div className="editor-banner">
+           {showBanner && (
              <img 
                src={bearBanner} 
                alt="Bear Banner" 
                className="banner-image"
              />
+           )}
          </div>
  
```

---
